name: Building Castles in the Sky
description:
It's the Stacker arcade game with physics. 99 Bricks/Tricky Towers inspired the concept. It was a quick project and my first 2D game, meaning it's not the most polished, but I'm proud of it.

Instructions

Stack blocks until you hit the top of the map. After passing a yellow line, all placed blocks will become frozen. After beating the game, you can choose to ascend and make the game harder.

Controls

Left Click or Space - Drop block

R - Return to buy menu (use if stuck)
